changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "tb_strategy" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "updated_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "asset_id" UUID NOT NULL, "name" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "slug" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "description" TEXT NULL, "risk_level" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, "min_apy" DECIMAL(5, 4) NOT NULL, "max_apy" DECIMAL(5, 4) NOT NULL, "min_lockup_seconds" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, --- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), UNIQUE ("slug"), FOREIGN KEY ("asset_id") REFERENCES "tb_asset"("id") ON DELETE CASCADE );
